recipesJson.name: Triple C's One-Shot
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This is the One-Shot for the extremely complex and layered Carmel cake with an underlying base of “soft-crack” butterscotch topped with a light vanilla cream recipe Triple C's

Pick up Triple C's here:
(US) -- https://diyordie.link/triplec-atf

Flavor & Recipe Development Notes:
https://diyordie.link/triplec-atf-recipe
